page.title: 06FRIDAYS - BY A GIRL AGED 10
page.content: I wake up usually at about 06:30 but don't get out of bed normally until 07:30.I then go downstairs for a breakfast of toast and marmite,coffee and sometimes cereal.After I have washed,I fetch my coat and go to school. Our first subject on a Friday is choir which I enjoy because I love singing.We then have history which is followed by playtime. After playtime,we have another one of my favourite lessons-maths. It is then lunch-time.I have school dinners and so am sent into he hall.When I have finished,I go out to play while the people who have packed lunch have theirs.The afternoon lessons are P.E.,playtime,and art.After these lessons,we get our homework together,say goodbye to our teacher and go home for the weekend.
